note.p: Iron founder and statistician. Son of Archibald (i) Kenrick, ironfounder, 1760–1835 (ODNB). Ironfounder at Varteg foundry, Monmouthshire, Wales, when he married Eliza Bowman at Gresford, Denbighshire, in 1836. Married, secondly, Sarah Stevenson. Author of Statistics of Merthyr Tydvil, Journal of the Statistical Society of London, 1846, pp. 14–21.
